discussion.content:
while True
print
response.links
except KeyError
Use KeyError to catch cases where the 'next' key (or any other expected key) is not present in the JSON response, indicating there are no more pages to fetch.
'except IndexError', so when the pagination ends, the loop breaks due to an exception.

choices.C: app-hosting run re-start appid devcorapp bugfix

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. app-hosting activate appid devcorapp

questions.question_text: A developer has created a fix for an application bug with the ID a98453928854x and has installed it on a Cisco Catalyst 9300 series switch. Which command will enable the application called devcorapp?

comments.content: Why POST if we need to search? Shouldn't be GET?

Intersight provides global search API that allows users to search for one or more resources in Intersight that matches certain attributes. The URL for the globalsearch API is POST /api/v1/search/SuggestItems.

Why do platforms require an API key to connect and stream data?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
I went with D. B is mostly right too, but API keys are often used by scripts without usernames and not users.
